Description: Resist Heat (U): Target is totally protected from all natural heat to 150 degrees C, and adds +10 to RR's vs. heat spells and -10 to elemental heat and fire spell attacks
Resist Cold (U): Target is totally protected from all natural cold to -30 degrees C, and adds +10 to RR's vs. cold spells and modifies spells involving cold by 10
Sly Ears (U): Target's hearing is augmented to double normal effectiveness
Balance (U*): Adds +50 to any rolls for one slow maneuver requiring athletics
Night Vision (U): Target can see 100' in normal darkness as if it were daylight. Magical darkness reduces the target's sight to 50'
Sidevision (U): Target has a 300 degree field of vision, all around except for directly behind them
Sounding (U): Target's voice has its loudness tripled. This has no effect on spellcasting capabilities.
Water Vision (U): As Nightvision, except target can see 100' ni water, even murky water.
Waterlungs (U): Target can breathe water as if it were normal air, but he wil be unable to function in air (he wil pass out but not die).
Gaslungs (U): As Waterlungs, except target can breathe any gas as fi it were normal air.
